title: Belgian Waffle Ride Utah: Sofia Gomez Villafa単e and Pete Stetina Solo to the Win
content:
Gomez Villafa単e crossed the line 13 minutes ahead of Courtney Sherwell in second; Stetina soloes the last 24 miles to beat Adam Roberge by 1:15.
